entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is Harry's dog. He bounded happily out of the house behind them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who said 'C'mon, Fang, we're going for a walk.'

entities.name: forest
entities.description: The Forest is where they went for a walk. Harry took out his wand and cast a spell to light their path.

entities.name: sycamore tree
entities.description: Fang lifted his leg against a large sycamore tree.

relationships.description: Harry and Fang went for a walk together.
They visited the Forest during their walk.
Fang lifted his leg against a large sycamore tree.
